title: Clytie - the passage primarily focuses on

content.question: The passage primarily focuses on the

choices.label: dying father’s last relationships with family and servants
mental and physical worlds of Clytie as her father is dying
vengeance visited on the family by those they have wronged
relationship of the family to the outside world during the father’s illness

content.answer: mental and physical worlds of Clytie as her father is dying

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain the function of a particular sequence of events in a plot.
